short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate speed boost for Chrome, an empty new tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your new tab will display a completely blank white page. This hides your most visited sites and the google logo minimizing distraction and speeding up browsing speed. This is a simple, but powerful, extension to boost your productivity.
